name: 賴建宏
objective:
本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟體，來分析與模擬類比、數位 IC 的行為與接觸設計過程：
1. 類比電路設計之 H-SPICE
2. 數位電路設計之 Verilog HDL
3. 通用程式語言 Python3
4. 賽靈思 PyNQ Z2 的使用
5. 基本機器學習範例
6. 專題設計
schedule:
This course is training students how to use computer-aided design software to analyze and simulate the behavior and design process of analog and digital ICs:
1. H-SPICE for analog circuit design
2. Verilog HDL for digital circuit design
3. General-purpose programming language Python3
4. Use of Xilinx PyNQ Z2
5. Basic machine learning examples
6. Project design
materials: Lectures will be PDF files, and will have some examples
